title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Joe Burrow, Chris Simms, Jason McIntyre
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Joe Burrow, Chris Simms, Jason McIntyre
description:
Chris Simms joins the final hour to talk about Joe Burrow being a rookie starter with no OTAs or Pre Season game reps. The underselling of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, who is a "real team". Jason McIntyre also joins to give insight opinion on the 76ers and NBA Bubble.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
